mapper.select: SELECT * FROM reservation_tbl WHERE id = #{id} ORDER BY reservationDate DESC LIMIT 0, 10;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reservation_tbl (id, ticketCode, movieCode, movieTitle, theaterPlace, theater, ticketPrice, reservationDate, movieDate, reservationTime, seats, visitors) VALUES (#{id}, #{ticketCode}, #{movieCode}, #{movieTitle}, #{theaterPlace}, #{theater}, #{ticketPrice}, NOW(), #{movieDate}, #{reservationTime}, #{seats}, #{visitors})
mapper.update: UPDATE movie_tbl SET cnt = cnt + 1 WHERE movieCode = #{movieCode}
mapper.select: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(reservationDate, "%Y-%m-%d") as reservationDate, ot.orderNum, pt.productCode, pt.productName, pt.productInfo, pt.price, ot.count, (ot.price * ot.count) AS totalPrice, ot.status FROM seenema.reservation_tbl WHERE id = #{id} ORDER BY reservationDate DESC LIMIT 0, 10;
